title: Neue Weinsteige
credit_line: Gift through the Museum Donor Program of the American Federation of the Arts
provenance_text:
Robert S. Neuman [1926-2015], Brookline, MA; Allan Stone Gallery, New York, NY [1]; American Federation of the Arts, New York, NY [2]; gift to Department of Fine Arts, Carnegie Institute, Pittsburgh, PA, September 1961.

Notes:
[1]. The painting was included (no. 287, illustrated in the catalogue) in "The 1961 Pittsburgh International Exhibition of Contemporary Painting and Sculpture" held at Carnegie Institute, Pittsburgh, PA, October 1961 - January 1962. It was lent by Allan Stone Gallery.
[2]. The painting was purchased with a gift from an anonymous donor, through the Museum Donor Program of the American Federation of the Arts.
